unittitle_ssm: Victoria Andritz collection of Brooklyn Life issues and Ruth Ann Shipley wedding photographs
abstract_ssm: This collection contains items donated to the Brooklyn Historical Society by Victoria Andritz, including various issues of Brooklyn Life, a weekly illustrated periodical for Brooklyn and Long Island, and two wedding photographs of Ruth Ann Shipley and her bridal party.
